tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE stores (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), location GEOMETRY);
CREATE TABLE customers (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), location GEOMETRY);
CREATE TABLE store_inventory (store_id INT, product_id INT, quantity INT, PRIMARY KEY (store_id, product_id));
CREATE TABLE products (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), category VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE spatial_queries (id INT PRIMARY KEY, query_name VARCHAR(255), radius INT);
